definitions: capable of being linked with or to something

examples.text: a phenomenon linkable to certain temporary circumstances in America

shortDefinitions: capable of being linked with or to

definitions: (of online content) capable or worthy of being linked to

examples.text: the article has a nice graphic explaining the process, although it isn't linkable
let's take a look at how to use these tools to generate linkable content

shortDefinitions: capable or worthy of being linked to
